title: [SKIN CONCEPT] Atlantean Zyra
body:
So, I haven't seen a lot of Atlantean skins in League lately. So, here's an Atlantean concept you guys might like! Atlantean Zyra! She uses the Plants of the Abyss to drown her enemies!

http://st.elohell.net/public/chill/481844192dda744933bef866f4f7ad39.jpg

Like it? Hate it? Upvote or Comment! Thanks to the artist that did this picture!

(Artwork by **Rae-Luz**)

replies.body: I really like the idea of aquatic plants - it'd be a neat spin on her!
Plz make this skins... or at least make a new Atlantean skin (may I recommend kennen or talon)
Nautilus needs more skins. Also, this, while it is a cool skin concept, doesn't really look anything like Zyra.

What we really need is Debonair Zac
I mean...
He would look REALLY good in a suit

Really pretty, but aquatic plants, plant-like things and sea animals (sea anemones, corals, squids) come in a wide range of colors, so a monochromatic (albeit cool) Zyra seems like a waste of potential.

That's less "atlantean" and more "alien seed."

Which I don't have a problem with.
^ YES YES. ^
Shyvana, Diana, Varus etc... Champ with 3 or less skin {{champion:113}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}}

{{champion:266}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:77}}{{champion:254}}{{champion:238}}   they also have 3 or less skin.

> {{champion:266}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:412}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:154}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:143}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:77}}{{champion:254}}{{champion:238}}   they also have 3 or less skin. 

Udyr has the only skin he will ever need.

What i want now is a VU on his base. And while they are at it, improvements to SGU. Dunkmaster D has like 40 tauns and jokes plus like another 20 lines for items.

Udyr has like 10. And hes a ultimate skin worth twice as much.... no logic there.... When he gets a vu, that skin needs to be brought up to standards.
You put Zyra twice. lol o-o
now i noticed, JK!! XD

> Shyvana, Diana, Varus etc... Champ with 3 or less skin {{champion:113}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} 

What?? Shyvana has 5 skins, not 3. Diana just got her 2nd skin earlier this year... Varus also got his 3rd skins a few months ago... Sejuani has more than 3 skins, and Yasuo literally JUST got his 2nd skin. Another for him would be too soon. There will be more for him later. He's a new champion. The 6300s generally don't have a lot from the start.

> > Shyvana, Diana, Varus etc... Champ with 3 or less skin {{champion:113}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:157}} 
> 
> What?? Shyvana has 5 skins, not 3. Diana just got her 2nd skin earlier this year... Varus also got his 3rd skins a few months ago... Sejuani has more than 3 skins, and Yasuo literally JUST got his 2nd skin. Another for him would be too soon. There will be more for him later. He's a new champion. The 6300s generally don't have a lot from the start.

Welll just saying dont make a other teemo skin ... or something like this and {{champion:113}} got 3 skin sorry i dont think one that can't be buy is well a chose. 
And Why Diana should not have a new skin? 
But ok shyvana got alot of skin they are just not really nice (i think just a opinions)
I do really like this but it kinda reminds me more of avatar than Atlantean
Void Zyra, please.

> Void Zyra, please.

As much as I would be against that, I was against there being a Void Fizz at first (cause the idea of a void fish just seemed really weird and retarded) and that turned out pretty awesome. So Void Zyra might be nice to see. Might check to see if there's any fanart of it.
That's really beautiful artwork. Excellently done.
Malzahar needs a new skin. One with unique particles. (Non-voidling particles.)
more zed skins prease c:

Riven
Braum
Syndra
Trundle
Varus
Swain
Zyra need a skin, plants all over in the world, but no time a skin-.-
For the poll, Kennen.

Zyra{{champion:143}}  definitely need more skins, now she only has two skins and it have been awhile since her launch.  Champions who also need new skins are {{champion:40}} it has been awhile since the last Janna skin, also {{champion:267}} has not had a new skin for a while.
YES YES 1 MILLION TIMES YES!
Honestly I love Zyra but she needs more skins.... Thinking about a frosted Zyra would be cool.{{champion:143}}
ZAC THO
{{champion:91}} has not had a new skin in 2 years. Rito plz.
2 words battlecast skarner
RITO PLEASE <3 <3 <3
I WANT THIS SKIN SOOOOOOOOOOOOO MUCH
{{champion:83}} ,{{champion:111}} ,{{champion:90}}
Ok, to tell you the truth, she does kinda look like an alien... But, deep down in the Abyss, there is barely any light down there, which probably gives Zyra that Sci-Fi quality.
Malzahar, Master Yi :3
ziggs,brand,MALZ

So, I kind of am curious as to why Jinx needs a skin right now. She's pretty new as opposed to, say, Zilean or Evelynn. Or even Taric...

Pulsefire Jinx please. >.>' (Would look really cool I think.)
{{champion:412}}  need halloween skin its obvious champ for halloween.

what about debonair Syndra with pool balls and each ball having a higher number? When she gets the maximum balls with 40% CDR and perfect combo the last ball will be an 8 ball. Her push could be poles too.

I like that idea. I'd love to have this skin.

Though like someone else said, it looks more alien but either way it's pretty cool.

Eve only has a couple, and not particularly good ones. Simple recolors.

Also, Zilean. He's been around since forever, and I've never seen him get another skin. Ever.
so far the only atlanteon skins are mid laners so zyra would be good lol
yEES
skarn needs a skin

While I agree Braum an Jinx need some more skins Eve has been around longer and also needs a complete VU. Since she needs a complete VU and maybe even rework people aren't going to make skins for her anytime soon. I was honestly surprised Vladimir got a skin since he looks like he could use one too.

I WOULD LOVE TO SEE THIS IN LEAGUE!!!
{{item:2043}} {{item:2043}}
I'd like to see some new Nami skins, personally.
I don't care much how the skin is called or what it looks like in game as long as this splash art makes it to live. Congratulations to the artist ~_~
honestly i think {{champion:48}} needs more skins idk what to do for him tho
^ There's always THAT guy in a skin concept thread.
